title: Child and Maternal Health Pilot Program (CMH-Pilot)
description: A list of the project details and awardees granted by the CCTSI for the Child and Maternal Health Pilot Program grant.
cleaned_text: The Colorado Clinical and Translational Sciences Institute (CCTSI) is pleased to announce the CCTSI Pilot Grant Awardees for the Child and Maternal Health Pilot (CMH-Pilot) program.
